member.name: M:CryptSharp.Crypter.SafeEquals(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if two strings are equal. Compares every char to prevent timing attacks.
member.returns: True if both strings are equal

member.name: T:CryptSharp.Utility.SCrypt
member.summary: See http://www.tarsnap.com/scrypt/scrypt.pdf for algorithm details. TODO: Test on a big-endian machine and make sure it works.
